izzy.datasets.RandomModelingDataset¶

class izzy.datasets.RandomModelingDataset(n_observations=100000, n_predictors=5, class_balance=0.5)[source]¶

Create a random dataset with a binary outcome for modeling tests

Methods:

__init__(n_observations=100000, n_predictors=5, class_balance=0.5)[source]¶

Initialize instance of RandomModelingDataset

Parameters

  • n_observations (int) – Number of observations in dataset.

  • n_predictors (int) – Number of predictors to the outcome. (Default: 5)

  • class_balance (float) – Percentage to skew the outcome (Default: 0.5, i.e., not skewed).

add_predictor(scale=1.0, size=1000000)[source]¶

Add a predictor to the random modeling dataset

Parameters

  • scale (Number) – Variance

  • size (Number) –
